Course_Name: QW: Introduction to Engineering Data Analytics with Python SoSe 2024

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Wrapping Up: Key Info and Final Project Details

Messages.Author: Can Cagincan
Messages.Content: Hi all, We're nearing the last lecture of the course, and I hope you've enjoyed diving into the world of data science!  It's been a dense semester, so apologies if some emails went unanswered. Please use the ISIS message system to avoid this issue. Before we start the final project, here are some important updates: The MOSES system is closed for further enrollments.  The Datacamp assignment has expired, and extensions aren't possible. Check the course ISIS page for more information. If you encounter issues with Datacamp, please be patient until your final points are updated in the coming weeks. Don’t forget to join a group. If you don’t have one, apply for random assignment in selection. All informations about the final project is already on the ISIS page. Data and group-specific tasks will be published this week. We'll hold a presentation about the final project details and answer all your questions this Friday (12.07.24). The session will be recorded. The project deadline is strictly 01.09.24. Regards, Can

Messages.Author: Can Cagincan
Messages.Content: The course is registered as: #50722 Einführung in die ingenieursorientierte Datenanalyse (Introduction to Engineering Data Analytics) - SoSe24  click here for link  Please note that there has been a mistake regarding the instructor's name for our module. Instead of my name, you will see that the module is listed under my colleague, Mr. Müller-Stein.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: FAQ about IDA Course & Registration Process
